DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; LEBANON ; 4 ISRAELI SOLDIERS KILLED IN AMBUSH
DOC.TEXT: Guerrillas killed four Israeli soldiers and wounded five in an ambush that drew retaliatory air and artillery strikes.The Israeli military said its jets attacked " Hezbollah terrorist targets " and scored " accurate hits " after the ambush in Israeli-occupied southern Lebanon . There was no immediate word on casualties among the guerrillas . The Israeli victims were the first Israelis killed in Lebanon in almost two months . Israel ' s military command said in a statement that five soldiers were wounded in the confrontation between its troops and " a terrorist force " and were evacuated by helicopter to Israel . Security sources in Lebanon had put the number of wounded at three .
